```{r}
library(modeldata)
library(tidyverse)
data("credit_data")
df <- as_tibble(credit_data)
knitr::kable(df %>% head())
library(mlr3)
task <- as_task_classif(df,target = "Status",id = 'credit')
task
set.seed(123)
split <- partition(task = task,ratio = 0.8)
# split
task$set_row_roles(rows = split$test,roles = "holdout")
# task$row_roles
```

learner
